meanings.definition: A gecko of Southeast Asia and the East Indies.
meanings.sent1: The tokay climbed up the wall with ease.
meanings.sent2: I saw a colorful tokay in the forest yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The tokay tried to catch its own tail, looking quite silly.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like the call of a tokay.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the tokay made it stand out in the green foliage.

meanings.definition: A sweet, strong wine from Hungary.
meanings.sent1: She poured a glass of tokay to enjoy with dessert.
meanings.sent2: The tokay paired perfectly with the rich chocolate cake.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally spilled tokay on his shirt, turning it a deep red.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the tokay filled the room, inviting everyone to taste.
meanings.sent5: The tokay left a lingering sweetness on her lips after each sip.
